query:
ALTER TABLE candidates 
ADD COLUMN currentSalary DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN currentHourlyRate DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN expectedSalary DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN expectedHourlyRate DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN salaryType ENUM('salary', 'hourly') DEFAULT NULL;

ADD COLUMN currentSalary DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN currentHourlyRate DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN expectedSalary DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN expectedHourlyRate DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN salaryType ENUM('salary', 'hourly') DEFAULT NULL;
